thread.section_title: Skyline Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hidden Gem!
thread.title_full: Hidden Gem! - Review of Skyline Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jerrikap
title: Hidden Gem!
text: We had an amazing time. The staff are extremely friendly and helpful. Affordable price and the cutest Mexican restaurant next to the lobby! The hotel pool looks nice, we spent most our time being tourist so we didn't use it, but it was nice having it as an option! Rooms are average, decent-- if you're looking for a "cheap" hotel near Times Square, this is a great place! Definitely will be visiting again next time we're in the city! Thanks for a great stay.
